Recipe: 4 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs. Rub with olive oil, season with salt, pepper, and fresh thyme.  In a separate pan, take fennel bulbs cut into several pieces, red bell peppers, shallots, carrots, potatoes, and lemons cut in half. Mix with a few teaspoons of olive oil, season with salt and pepper.  Bake at 360 for 50 minutes to an hour. If you want, you can broil the chicken for an additional 3 minutes. Squeeze the lemon over chicken and vegetables when done.
